title: Choosing the right JDK for WildFly and JBoss EAP 7
content: This tutorial discusses the recommended JDK versions to be used for WildFly and JBoss Enterprise Application Platform (EAP) and how to set the Java version for it. The modularization of the JVM that began with Java 9 had a significant impact on a complex server like WildFly, particularly in the areas of classloading and reflection, ...  The post appeared first on .
